body.title: Mobile Number is invalid.
body.detail: The mobile number supplied is invalid.

possibleCauses: UAT environment only accepts whitelisted test numbers for Vodacom
Product D1eiCf7vEOVbYERfE1vZ may not be available in UAT
Mobile number format issue (though format appears correct: 10 digits, starts with 0)

request.note: Full MobileMart API payload not captured in logs

response.errorMessage: This mobile number cannot be recharged on the CellC network. Please verify the mobile number belongs to CellC or select a different product.

possibleCauses: Mobile number may not be a valid CellC number

telkom.note: Working 100% - Payload not captured in provided logs. Need to extract from Codespaces backend logs or perform new test transaction.

mtn.note: Working 100% - Payload not captured in provided logs. Need to extract from Codespaces backend logs or perform new test transaction.

questionsForMobileMart.question: Are there specific whitelisted test numbers for Vodacom/CellC in UAT?
questionsForMobileMart.context: Telkom and MTN work perfectly, suggesting our integration is correct, but Vodacom and CellC fail with invalid number errors.

questionsForMobileMart.question: Is product 'D1eiCf7vEOVbYERfE1vZ' (Vodacom Power 60min Voice Bundle R5) available in UAT?
questionsForMobileMart.context: Receiving error 1013 'Mobile Number is invalid' which may actually be a product availability issue.

questionsForMobileMart.question: What mobile number formats should we use for testing each network in UAT?
questionsForMobileMart.context: We're using standard SA format (0720012345) which works for Telkom/MTN but fails for Vodacom/CellC.

questionsForMobileMart.question: Can you provide test mobile numbers for all networks (Vodacom, CellC, MTN, Telkom)?
questionsForMobileMart.context: To ensure comprehensive UAT testing before production deployment.

nextSteps: Extract successful Telkom/MTN payloads from Codespaces logs
Send complete report to MobileMart support
Request UAT test numbers for all networks
Verify product availability in UAT for Vodacom/CellC
